trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of Windows claims that are associated with an entity.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> class by using the Windows user identity specified by the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> object.
The claims representing the Windows groups to which this user belongs are added to the claim set.
The expiration time is set to 10 hours.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> class by using the Windows user identity specified by the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> object.
The expiration time is set to 10 hours.
`true` to include the claims representing the Windows groups to which this user belongs; otherwise, `false`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> class by using the Windows user identity specified by the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that specifies the expiration time for the claim set.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> class by using the Windows user identity specified by the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> object.
`true` to include the Windows groups to which this user belongs; otherwise, `false`.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that specifies the expiration time for the claim set.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> class by using the Windows user identity specified by the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> that specifies the Windows identity.
The authentication type for the Windows Identity.
`true` to include the Windows groups to which this user belongs; otherwise, `false`.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that specifies the expiration time for the claim set.
Gets the number of claims in this collection.
The number of claims in this collection.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
Call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet.Dispose%2A> method when you are finished using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> in an unusable state.

After calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet.Dispose%2A> method, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> occupied.

For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
Always call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet.Dispose%2A> method before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>.
Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> object's `Finalize` method.
Gets the expiration time for this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> in which this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> expires.
Searches for the claim that matches the specified claim type and rights in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
Use the properties of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes> class to specify the `claimType` parameter.
The uniform resource identifier (URI) of a claim type.
The URI of the right associated with the new claim.
A `System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Claim>` object that enables you to enumerate the claims that match the specified criteria.
Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1"></xref> that can be used to enumerate the Windows claims in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1"></xref> that can be used to enumerate the Windows claims in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
Gets the issuer for this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
The issuer for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> is <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet.Windows%2A>.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> that represents the issuer of this claim set.
Gets the claim for the specified index.
The index of the Windows claim to be retrieved.
The claim for the specified index.
Returns this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> object.
This <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> object.
Gets the Windows identity for this claim set.
The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> for this claim set.
